definition: surname Lan/abbr. for Lanzhou 蘭州|兰州[Lan2 zhou1], Gansu
orchid (蘭花|兰花 Cymbidium goeringii)/fragrant thoroughwort (蘭草|兰草 Eupatorium fortunei)/lily magnolia (木蘭|木兰)
"eight" component in Chinese characters/archaic variant of 八[ba1]
one of the characters used in kwukyel, an ancient Korean writing system
Lanzhou prefecture-level city and capital of Gansu province 甘肅|甘肃[Gan1 su4]
Lanzhou prefecture-level city and capital of Gansu province 甘肅|甘肃[Gan1 su4]

sentences.english: After lunch , the group will visit macadamia nuts farm , rainbow falls and an orchid garden.
sentences.chinese: 下午参观夏威夷农场兰花园和彩虹瀑布。

sentences.english: The blue-white brilliants are the stones of the "finest water" .
sentences.chinese: 兰白色的宝石是光泽度最好的钻石。

sentences.english: Death: for Syria is not a penalty, on the contrary is an accomplished.
sentences.chinese: 死，对于亚斯兰并非是一种惩罚，相反是一种成全。

sentences.english: If couldn t hand in the finished product, he wishes will be dashed.
sentences.chinese: 届时若交不出成品，兰博士的心愿就要落空了。

sentences.english: And here I'd heard a Lannister always pays his debts.
sentences.chinese: 在这儿我听说兰尼斯特有债必还。

sentences.english: His name was Mr Frankland, and he lived about four miles to the south of the Hall.
sentences.chinese: 他是福兰克兰先生，住在庄园以南约四英里远的地方。

sentences.english: He had reached Randalls the evening before.
sentences.chinese: 弗兰克是头天晚上到达兰多尔斯的。

sentences.english: “Without them, we couldn’t hold our own in the Bundesliga,” says Mr Rangnick.
sentences.chinese: “没有他们，我们的德甲就没法继续”兰尼克如是说。

sentences.english: Earl Rambert's response to my offer came today.
sentences.chinese: 今天兰贝尔特伯爵关于我的要求有了回复。

sentences.english: Best wishes for a successful co-operation between Buckland Overseas Education Group and No. 2 Middle School.
sentences.chinese: 愿攀枝花市第二中学与巴克兰海外教育集团合作成功。

sentences.english: In 1893, Henry Ziegland ended a relationship with his girlfriend.
sentences.chinese: 1893年亨利希格兰与其女友分手了。

sentences.english: Hm. Located in Barcelona's architecturally stunning La Rambla neighborhood.
sentences.chinese: 嗯，位于巴塞罗那的著名建筑兰布拉大道附近。

sentences.english: Fruit anatomy of Lonicera edulis and its taxonomic significance.
sentences.chinese: 兰靛果忍冬的果实解剖及其分类意义。

sentences.english: Lambada, a fast modern dance originally from Brazil, also named dance next to skin.
sentences.chinese: 兰巴达，源自巴西的快步现代舞，也叫贴身舞。

sentences.english: The guards saw you with Lentil. Up at the penthouse.
sentences.chinese: 警卫看见了你和兰缇一起，上到顶楼。

sentences.english: Nahor, you shall be punished by tending to the sheep for Abram and Haran.
sentences.chinese: 纳曷尔，你被罚替亚伯兰和哈兰放羊。

definition: surname Luo/old name of several rivers (in Henan, Shaanxi, Sichuan and Anhui)
to eat/(extended meaning) to endure/putrid smell/vegetables/roots (inextricably attached to the plant)
to approach/to rise high/thick ice/to insult or maltreat
